title: Event Notes: How Will China Move on from the Covid-19 Pandemic?
dc:creator: Utsav Gandhi
description:
Countries around the world have overseen wide-ranging public health responses to the Covid-19 pandemic. On June 10, the Stigler Center hosted a panel of experts to discuss China’s zero-Covid response to the pandemic and how it might reconsider its policy going forward. The Stigler Center, ProMarket’s home institute, has organized a series of webinars this […]

The post Event Notes: How Will China Move on from the Covid-19 Pandemic? appeared first on ProMarket.
